PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-16352011-12-15,  ,  CIC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of CLIFFORD BERRY of Newmarket, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months or a period expiring on the day prior to the coming into force of the Balance Refugee Reform Act, whichever period ends earlier, effective January 3, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of CLIFFORD BERRY of Newmarket, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months or a period expiring on the day prior to the coming into force of the Balance Refugee Reform Act, whichever period ends earlier, effective January 3, 2012.
